alert.note: Alert for Badlands Area; Custer County Plains; Fall River County Area; Pine Ridge Area (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 20 at 2:24AM MDT until July 20 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, 317, 322, 325, 326, AND 332... .Hot and dry weather is expected today. Temperatures will rise to the 90s as minimum relative humidities drop to 10-15%. A surface trough slides into the area this afternoon which will create gusty northwest winds. The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidities will create critical fire weather conditions this afternoon and early evening. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, 317, 322, 325, 326, AND 332... The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 2 PM this afternoon to 8 PM MDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 314 Northern Campbell, 315 Southern Campbell, 317 Weston County Plains, 322 Fall River County Area, 325 Custer County Plains, 326 Pine Ridge Area and 332 Badlands Area. * WINDS...Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Badlands Area; Custer County Plains; Fall River County Area; Pine Ridge Area
